title: Bug 135848Set a row to Y series, then delete the row, error message shoule be pop up.
OB: Bug 135848Set a row to Y series, then delete the row, error message shoule be pop up.
SR: Bug 135848Set a row to Y series, then delete the row, error message shoule be pop up. Set a row to Y series, then delete the row, error message shoule be pop up.Steps:1.Create a bar chart2.Open Chart Builder, go to "Select Data" tab, select a data set, click "Data Binding..." button, add a new row["a"]3.Set row["a"] to Y series4.Then click "Data Binding..." button, delete row["a"]5.Click "Finish" button6.Preview or Double click the chartActual Results:1.Have no error message, chart can not be previewedExpected Results:1.Error message should be pop up.
